messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN VAUXHALL
messages.content: At this election local people and government are seeking a new MP to mend our economy and government - why not let it be you!

messages.title: HIGH DEDICATION TO EDUCATION
messages.content: Glyn Chambers has been a governor of St. John's and St. Clement's primary school for two years and supports local education needs. He will take action to drive up standards and raise educational attainment.

messages.title: ABOVE: WINNING IN THE FIGHT AGAINST CRIME
messages.content: As a Special Constable, Glyn is directly connected to our community safety. He is dedicated to the fight against anti-social behaviour and supports regular 'walkabouts' to identify and reduce

Glyn Chambers is dedicated to the fight against anti-social behaviour and supports regular 'walkabouts' to identify and reduce issues.

issues.education: Glyn Chambers has been a governor of a local school and pledges to drive up standards and raise educational attainment.

politicalExperience.achievements: Dedicated to community safety and the fight against anti-social behaviour.
